start.text: Halt! State your business. This area is under militia protection.

choices.text: I'm a traveler, just passing through.
I support the militia. Here are some supplies.

neutral_response.text: Be on your way, then. Don't cause any trouble.

hostile_response.text: Is that a threat? You're either with us or against us. Which is it?

positive_response.text: Supplies are always welcome. We appreciate your support. Stay safe out there.
